alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 21 at 2:47PM EST until December 22 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed wintry precipitation but freezing rain/drizzle will be the dominant precipitation type. Ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch, with total snow accumulations of up to one inch * WHERE...Western Franklin MA, Eastern Franklin MA, Western Hampshire MA and Western Hampden MA Counties, including the cities of Charlemont, Greenfield, Orange, Chesterfield, and Blandford. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Slippery travel conditions are expected, especially untreated surfaces. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Franklin; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire
